messages.subject: Unschooling Voices #4 is up and ready...
messages.msgSnippet: I just finished posting Unschooling Voices #4 and I d like to invite all of you to take a look. :-) This months optional question was about math. Here s the
messages.messageBody:
I just finished posting Unschooling Voices #4 and I'd like to invite
all of you to take a look. :-) This months optional question was
about math.

Here's the link:
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/2006/10/unschooling-voices-
4.html

If the link doesn't work, go to the Unschooling Voices main page and
scroll down until you see "October". From that main page you can
also catch up on past editions and get information on how you can
submit your thoughts. :-) You don't need a blog...just some
unschooling thoughts swirling around your head. :-)

Here's the link to the main page:
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

The new (always optional) question for the month is:
On the topic of support in unschooling...how much do you have from
family & friends? Are there other unschoolers near you or do you
belong to an offline unschooling group? How important is having that
support?

If you'd like to answer it here, please reply to this message (so
Unschooling Voices stays in the subject line) that way I can find
it...or feel free to e-mail it directly to me. You'll find the UV e-
mail address at the link to the main page.

I hope you enjoy reading it as much as I did. :-)

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 2003
